name: as-css-vars
description: convert a generic object into CSS variables

scripts.build: npm run cjs && npm test && npm run esm && npm run min && npm run size
scripts.cjs: cp index.js cjs/index.js; echo 'module.exports = asCSSVars;' >> cjs/index.js
scripts.esm: cp index.js esm/index.js; echo 'export default asCSSVars;' >> esm/index.js;
scripts.min: echo '/*! (c) 2018, Andrea Giammarchi, (ISC) */'>min.js && uglifyjs index.js --support-ie8 -c -m >> min.js
scripts.size: cat index.js | wc -c;cat min.js | wc -c;gzip -c9 min.js | wc -c

author: Andrea Giammarchi
